channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Deadly attack on Bondi Beach follows rise in antisemitic incidents in Australia
item.description: Australia, like other countries, has seen a rise in antisemitic attacks since the start of the war in Gaza.
item.content:encoded:
Australia, like other countries, has seen a rise in antisemitic attacks since the start of the war in Gaza.

(Image credit: Saeed Khan)
item.dc:creator: Scott Horsley

item.title: What to know about the Brown University shooting
item.description: Police have detained a man in his 20s as a person of interest.
item.content:encoded:
Police have detained a man in his 20s as a person of interest.

(Image credit: Bing Guan)
item.dc:creator: Joe Hernandez

item.title: Chile shifts sharply right as José Antonio Kast wins Presidency
item.description: José Antonio Kast, a far-right politician who has praised Chile's former dictatorship, has won the presidency, signaling a sharp rightward shift fueled by fears over crime, migration and the economy.
item.content:encoded:
José Antonio Kast, a far-right politician who has praised Chile's former dictatorship, has won the presidency, signaling a sharp rightward shift fueled by fears over crime, migration and the economy.

(Image credit: JAVIER TORRES)
item.dc:creator: John Bartlett

item.title: What we know so far about the Brown University shooting investigation
item.description: Journalist Paul C. Kelly Campos of Ocean State Media on the continuing investigation into Saturday's shooting at Brown University that left two people dead and at least nine more wounded.
item.content:encoded: Journalist Paul C. Kelly Campos of Ocean State Media on the continuing investigation into Saturday's shooting at Brown University that left two people dead and at least nine more wounded.
item.dc:creator: Miles Parks

item.title: Bystander hailed as a hero for disarming Sydney gunman
item.description: New South Wales Premier Chris Minns on Sunday praised the man's actions, calling it "the most unbelievable scene."
item.content:encoded:
New South Wales Premier Chris Minns on Sunday praised the man's actions, calling it "the most unbelievable scene."

(Image credit: Mark Baker)
item.dc:creator: Chandelis Duster

item.title: The cookies that fueled votes for women
item.description: Suffragists didn't just march. They baked, held bake sales and sold cookbooks to raise money for the cause of equality.
item.content:encoded:
Suffragists didn't just march. They baked, held bake sales and sold cookbooks to raise money for the cause of equality.

(Image credit: Elizabeth Gillis)
item.dc:creator: Ayesha Rascoe

item.title: Voices of experience and hope soar in a song to prevent suicide
item.description: "Hold the Hope" was sparked by one woman's experience as a caregiver to someone who survived suicidal struggles. It started as a poem that has become a film, a song and even a dance.
item.content:encoded: "Hold the Hope" was sparked by one woman's experience as a caregiver to someone who survived suicidal struggles. It started as a poem that has become a film, a song and even a dance.
item.dc:creator: Rhitu Chatterjee

item.title: Tanning bed users are at higher risk of skin cancer, especially in unusual places
item.description: Indoor tanning is trending among Gen Z. A new study finds tanning bed users not only have a much higher risk of melanoma, they also have DNA damage linked to cancer across nearly their entire skin.
item.content:encoded:
Indoor tanning is trending among Gen Z. A new study finds tanning bed users not only have a much higher risk of melanoma, they also have DNA damage linked to cancer across nearly their entire skin.

(Image credit: Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Maria Godoy

item.title: At least 15 killed in mass shooting at Hanukkah event on Sydney's Bondi Beach
item.description: Hundreds had gathered for an event at Bondi Beach called Chanukah by the Sea, which was celebrating the start of the Hanukkah Jewish festival.
item.content:encoded:
Hundreds had gathered for an event at Bondi Beach called Chanukah by the Sea, which was celebrating the start of the Hanukkah Jewish festival.

(Image credit: George Chan)
item.dc:creator: Chandelis Duster

item.title: US envoys arrive in Berlin for latest round of Ukraine peace talks with Zelenskyy
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump's special envoy Steve Witkoff and son-in-law Jared Kushner will meet Ukrainian leader Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Sunday, as Trump grows increasingly exasperated by delays.
item.content:encoded:
U.S. President Donald Trump's special envoy Steve Witkoff and son-in-law Jared Kushner will meet Ukrainian leader Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Sunday, as Trump grows increasingly exasperated by delays.

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press
